page.title: 01Where we live.
page.content: Exmoor is where we live with hills of brilliant green. Dunkery looks down on us with blobs of heather and gorse.The River Avill races down to Timberscombe meets the Hanny that runs through Wootton Courtenay.We have good green farmland here.At Bickham you hear cows mooing and lambs bleating;maize gleams in the sun round Brookside Farm;in the sunshine the sawmill is in action at Cowbridge;down at the Mill the Potter squashes the clay into the right shape forms it into a beautiful pot.The Dunkery will soon be filling with tourists; the narrow twisty lanes will soon be full of revving beeping cars. You might meet big blue milk tankers with bodies full of fresh milk from the farm; trailers rattling as the tractors pull them along;trout are flitting in and out of shady water. That's how it goes on.
